title: veigar pls
body: veigar went 19/4/11 and didnt get an S... riot pls nerf veigar {{champion:45}}

replies.body: Probably have to drop more wards!  Full disclosure: I have no idea how the scores are calculated.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGE2omoL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-24T01:16:17.327+0000)
>
>  Full disclosure: I have no idea how the scores are calculated.

Might take some internal research, but it feels like its harder to get an S since this last patch.
I've recently gone something similar with Evelynn and also received no S (not even an S-)
Could you provide the match history link?
